context.description: Please outline a detailed guide for setting up a SharePoint site covering the following topics: - Consistent Branding and Theme - Document Libraries for Case Management - Basic Permissions Setup for the Team - Navigation Links to Hub Sites - Custom Columns for Metadata - Automated Case Status Tracking - Standard Web Parts For each section, include in-depth explanations, practical examples, and, where appropriate, illustrations or visual aids. Additionally, offer best practices, tips for implementation, and potential troubleshooting solutions.

section.title: Consistent Branding and Theme
section.details: Explain how to create and apply a custom theme, set a logo, and configure navigation layout across the tenant.

section.title: Document Libraries for Case Management
section.details: Include steps for creating libraries, adding custom metadata columns, and managing retention policies.

section.title: Automated Case Status Tracking
section.details: Provide a step-by-step workflow using Power Automate for tracking case progress and sending notifications.
